sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnindvdlyrycmanage ( OCCRRNC_YEAR /* */ , YRYC_OCCRRNC_CO /* */ , USE_YRYC_CO /* */ , REMNDR_YRYC_CO /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , USER_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #occrrncYear# /* */ , #yrycOccrrncCo# /* */ , #useYrycCo# /* */ , #remndrYrycCo# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #userId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnindvdlyrycmanage SET OCCRRNC_YEAR=#occrrncYear# /* */ , YRYC_OCCRRNC_CO=#yrycOccrrncCo# /* */ , USE_YRYC_CO=#useYrycCo# /* */ , REMNDR_YRYC_CO=#remndrYrycCo# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , USER_ID=#userId# /* */ WHERE OCCRRNC_YEAR=#occrrncYear# /* */ AND USER_ID=#userId# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnindvdlyrycmanage WHERE OCCRRNC_YEAR=#occrrncYear# /* */ AND USER_ID=#userId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT OCCRRNC_YEAR /* */ , YRYC_OCCRRNC_CO /* */ , USE_YRYC_CO /* */ , REMNDR_YRYC_CO /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , USER_ID /* */ FROM comtnindvdlyrycmanage WHERE OCCRRNC_YEAR=#occrrncYear# /* */ AND USER_ID=#userId# /* */

SELECT OCCRRNC_YEAR /* */ , YRYC_OCCRRNC_CO /* */ , USE_YRYC_CO /* */ , REMNDR_YRYC_CO /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , USER_ID /* */ FROM comtnindvdlyrycmanage WHERE 1=1
OCCRRNC_YEAR = #searchKeyword# /* */
YRYC_OCCRRNC_CO LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY OCCRRNC_YEAR DESC /* */ , USER_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnindvdlyrycmanage WHERE 1=1
OCCRRNC_YEAR = #searchKeyword# /* */
YRYC_OCCRRNC_CO LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
